cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB integrity to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent proper security setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the DRB integrity to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing failure and prevent proper security setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 DRB 完整性設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid'，會導致配置解析失敗，並阻止正確的安全設定。
